705374f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, between Tompkins and Marcy Avenues.  View 1 shows the Hebrew National school, at No. 687; view 2, a private mansion, at No. 671.

P. L. Sperr
August 26, 1941
Views 1,2
705374f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Tompkins Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
